EmailTemplate.name: Bad Timing Nurture - Day 32
EmailTemplate.subject: Stand out with Luxury Presence
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName} ,
We know that a strong online presence is essential for any successful real estate business.
If you're not quite ready to get started, that's okay. But we'd still love the opportunity to show you what Luxury Presence can do—from our customized websites to our smart tools, including our Digital CMA integration, Instant Property Sites, and On-Demand Ads™.
If you're interested in seeing how we've helped other real estate professionals, check out our case studies here.
Whenever you have questions or would like to learn more, feel free to book a time on my calendar.
Let me know how I can help.
Best, {!User.Name}
